snippet: WIESEL--Elie. Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of Religion mourns our beloved honorary alumnus, tenacious guardian of Holocaust memory, and inspiring advocate for the Jewish people, Israel, and humanity. Rabbi Aaron Panken, Ph.D. President An...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institute of Religion mourns our beloved honorary alumnus, tenacious guardian of Holocaust memory, and inspiring advocate for the Jewish people, Israel, and humanity. Rabbi Aaron Panken, Ph.D. President Andrew Berger, Chair, Board of Governors 1/3
